blocks.name: disjnf
blocks.content: In case ` x ` is not free in ` B ` , disjointness is not so interesting since it reduces to cases where ` A ` is a singleton. (Google Groups discussion with Peter Mazsa.) (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Jul-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjnf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wo(wceq(c1, emptycls), wmo(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wo(wceq(c1, emptycls), wmo(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wo(wceq(cin(c1, c1), emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wral(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))), wo(wceq(c1, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wral(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))))
  orbi1i(wceq(cin(c1, c1), emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wral(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wceq(c1, emptycls))
  eqeq1i(cin(c1, c1), emptycls, c1)
  inidm(c1)
  3bitri(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wo(wceq(cin(c1, c1), emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wral(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))), wral(s0, c0, wral(hs0, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cin(c1, c1), emptycls)))), wral(s0, c0, wo(wceq(cin(c1, c1), emptycls), wral(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))))
  disjor(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c1)
  eqidd(c1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  ralbii(s0, c0, wral(hs0, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cin(c1, c1), emptycls))), wo(wceq(cin(c1, c1), emptycls), wral(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))
  bitri(wral(hs0, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cin(c1, c1), emptycls))), wo(wceq(cin(c1, c1), emptycls), wral(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wral(hs0, c0, wo(wceq(cin(c1, c1), emptycls), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))
  ralbii(hs0, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cin(c1, c1), emptycls)), wo(wceq(cin(c1, c1), emptycls), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  orcom(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cin(c1, c1), emptycls))
  r19.32v(hs0, c0, wceq(cin(c1, c1), emptycls), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  r19.32v(s0, c0, wceq(cin(c1, c1), emptycls), wral(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  orbi2i(wceq(c1, emptycls), wmo(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wral(s0, c0, wral(hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))
  moel(s0, hs0, c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cin(c1, c1), emptycls))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cin(c1, c1), emptycls)
  diff.cin.s(s0, c1, c1)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

thm disjnf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚Üî(c1 = ‚àÖ ‚à® ‚àÉ*(s0, s0 ‚àà c0)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4i(‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), (c1 = ‚àÖ ‚à® ‚àÉ*(s0, s0 ‚àà c0)), ((c1 ‚ãÇ c1)= ‚àÖ ‚à® ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, s0 = hs0))), (c1 = ‚àÖ ‚à® ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, s0 = hs0))))
  orbi1i((c1 ‚ãÇ c1)= ‚àÖ, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, s0 = hs0)), c1 = ‚àÖ)
  eqeq1i((c1 ‚ãÇ c1), emptycls, c1)
  inidm(c1)
  3bitri(‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), ((c1 ‚ãÇ c1)= ‚àÖ ‚à® ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, s0 = hs0))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(s0 = hs0 ‚à®(c1 ‚ãÇ c1)= ‚àÖ))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,((c1 ‚ãÇ c1)= ‚àÖ ‚à® ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, s0 = hs0))))
  disjor(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c1)
  eqidd(c1, s0 = hs0)
  ralbii(s0, c0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(s0 = hs0 ‚à®(c1 ‚ãÇ c1)= ‚àÖ)), ((c1 ‚ãÇ c1)= ‚àÖ ‚à® ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, s0 = hs0)))
  bitri(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(s0 = hs0 ‚à®(c1 ‚ãÇ c1)= ‚àÖ)), ((c1 ‚ãÇ c1)= ‚àÖ ‚à® ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, s0 = hs0)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0,((c1 ‚ãÇ c1)= ‚àÖ ‚à® s0 = hs0)))
  ralbii(hs0, c0, (s0 = hs0 ‚à®(c1 ‚ãÇ c1)= ‚àÖ), ((c1 ‚ãÇ c1)= ‚àÖ ‚à® s0 = hs0))
  orcom(s0 = hs0, (c1 ‚ãÇ c1)= ‚àÖ)
  r19.32v(hs0, c0, (c1 ‚ãÇ c1)= ‚àÖ, s0 = hs0)
  r19.32v(s0, c0, (c1 ‚ãÇ c1)= ‚àÖ, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, s0 = hs0))
  orbi2i(c1 = ‚àÖ, ‚àÉ*(s0, s0 ‚àà c0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, s0 = hs0)))
  moel(s0, hs0, c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ‚ãÇ c1)= ‚àÖ)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (c1 ‚ãÇ c1), emptycls)
  diff.cin.s(s0, c1, c1)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: cbvdisjf
blocks.content: Change bound variables in a disjoint collection. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvdisjf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wdisj(s1, c0, c2))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s1, c1)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wdisj(s1, c0, c2), wal(hs0, wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wal(hs0, wrmo(s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  albii(hs0, wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wrmo(s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  3bitr4i(wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wrmo(s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wmo(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  cbvmo(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  nfan(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  nfv(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  nfcri(s1, hs0, c1)
  nfan(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfcri(s0, s1, c0)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c2)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  eleq1w(s0, s1, c0)
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), c1, c2, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  df-rmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  df-rmo(s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  df-disj(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  df-disj(s1, hs0, c0, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cbvdisjf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚Üî ‚äî(s1 ‚àà c0, c2))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = s1 ‚Üí c1 = c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), ‚äî(s1 ‚àà c0, c2), ‚àÄ(hs0, ‚àÉ*(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c1)), ‚àÄ(hs0, ‚àÉ*(s1 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c2)))
  albii(hs0, ‚àÉ*(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c1), ‚àÉ*(s1 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c2))
  3bitr4i(‚àÉ*(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c1), ‚àÉ*(s1 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c2), ‚àÉ*(s0,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1)), ‚àÉ*(s1,(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2)))
  cbvmo(s0, s1, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1), (s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  nfan(s1, s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c1)
  nfv(s1, s0 ‚àà c0)
  nfcri(s1, hs0, c1)
  nfan(s0, s1 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c2)
  nfcri(s0, s1, c0)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c2)
  anbi12d(s0 = s1, s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c2)
  eleq1w(s0, s1, c0)
  eleq2d(hs0, c1, c2, s0 = s1)
  df-rmo(s0, c0, hs0 ‚àà c1)
  df-rmo(s1, c0, hs0 ‚àà c2)
  df-disj(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  df-disj(s1, hs0, c0, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: disjss1f
blocks.content: A subset of a disjoint collection is disjoint. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Apr-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjss1f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wi(wdisj(s0, c1, c2), wdisj(s0, c0, c2)))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3imtr4g(wss(c0, c1), wdisj(s0, c1, c2), wdisj(s0, c0, c2), wal(hs0, wrmo(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wal(hs0, wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  alimdv(hs0, wss(c0, c1), wrmo(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  ssrmof(s0, c0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  df-disj(s0, hs0, c1, c2)
  df-disj(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c0, c1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm disjss1f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚Üí(‚äî(s0 ‚àà c1, c2)‚Üí ‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c2)))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c1)
} = {
  3imtr4g(c0 ‚äÜ c1, ‚äî(s0 ‚àà c1, c2), ‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c2), ‚àÄ(hs0, ‚àÉ*(s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà c2)), ‚àÄ(hs0, ‚àÉ*(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c2)))
  alimdv(hs0, c0 ‚äÜ c1, ‚àÉ*(s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà c2), ‚àÉ*(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c2))
  ssrmof(s0, c0, c1, hs0 ‚àà c2)
  df-disj(s0, hs0, c1, c2)
  df-disj(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚äÜ c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.content: Equality theorem for disjoint collection. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2016.)

blocks.name: disjdifprg
blocks.content: A trivial partition into a subset and its complement. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjdifprg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wdisj(s0, cpr(cdif(c2, c0), c0), cv(s0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wdisj(s0, cpr(cdif(c2, c0), c0), cv(s0)), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, emptycls)), wdisj(s0, cpr(cdif(c2, c0), c0), cv(s0)), wdisj(s0, cpr(c2, emptycls), cv(s0)))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(c0, emptycls), wdisj(s0, cpr(c2, emptycls), cv(s0)))
  pm2.61dane(c2, emptycls, wcel(c2, c3), wdisj(s0, cpr(c2, emptycls), cv(s0)))
  mpbiri(wa(wcel(c2, c3), wceq(c2, emptycls)), wdisj(s0, cpr(c2, emptycls), cv(s0)), wdisj(s0, csn(emptycls), cv(s0)))
  disjxsn(s0, emptycls, cv(s0))
  disjeq1d(s0, cpr(c2, emptycls), cv(s0), csn(emptycls), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wceq(c2, emptycls)))
  mpbir2and(wa(wcel(c2, c3), wceq(c2, emptycls)), wceq(cpr(c2, emptycls), csn(emptycls)), wceq(c2, emptycls), wceq(emptycls, emptycls))
  simpr(wcel(c2, c3), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  eqidd(emptycls, wa(wcel(c2, c3), wceq(c2, emptycls)))
  adantr(wcel(c2, c3), wceq(c2, emptycls), wb(wceq(cpr(c2, emptycls), csn(emptycls)), wa(wceq(c2, emptycls), wceq(emptycls, emptycls))))
  preqsnd(c2, emptycls, emptycls, wcel(c2, c3))
  a1i(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  mpbiri(wa(wcel(c2, c3), wne(c2, emptycls)), wdisj(s0, cpr(c2, emptycls), cv(s0)), wceq(cin(c2, emptycls), emptycls))
  in0(c2)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c2, c3), wne(c2, emptycls)), wb(wdisj(s0, cpr(c2, emptycls), cv(s0)), wceq(cin(c2, emptycls), emptycls)), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(emptycls, universe), wne(c2, emptycls))
  adantr(wcel(c2, c3), wne(c2, emptycls), wcel(c2, universe))
  elex(c2, c3)
  a1i(wa(wcel(c2, c3), wne(c2, emptycls)), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  0ex()
  simpr(wcel(c2, c3), wne(c2, emptycls))
  disjprg(s0, c2, universe, emptycls, cv(s0), c2, emptycls)
  id(wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  id(wceq(cv(s0), emptycls))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, emptycls), wb(wdisj(s0, cpr(cdif(c2, c0), c0), cv(s0)), wdisj(s0, cpr(c2, emptycls), cv(s0))))
  disjeq1d(s0, cpr(cdif(c2, c0), c0), cv(s0), cpr(c2, emptycls), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  preq12d(cdif(c2, c0), c0, c2, emptycls, wceq(c0, emptycls))
  syl6eq(cdif(c2, c0), c2, cdif(c2, emptycls), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  difeq2(c0, emptycls, c2)
  dif0(c2)
  id(wceq(c0, emptycls))
  mpbiri(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wceq(c0, emptycls))), wdisj(s0, cpr(cdif(c2, c0), c0), cv(s0)), wceq(cin(cdif(c2, c0), c0), emptycls))
  eqtr3i(cin(cdif(c2, c0), c0), emptycls, cin(c0, cdif(c2, c0)))
  incom(c0, cdif(c2, c0))
  disjdif(c0, c2)
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wceq(c0, emptycls))), wb(wdisj(s0, cpr(cdif(c2, c0), c0), cv(s0)), wceq(cin(cdif(c2, c0), c0), emptycls)), wcel(cdif(c2, c0), universe), wcel(c0, universe), wne(cdif(c2, c0), c0))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wn(wceq(c0, emptycls)), wcel(cdif(c2, c0), universe))
  difexg(c2, c3, c0)
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wn(wceq(c0, emptycls)), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wceq(c0, emptycls)), wne(cdif(c2, c0), c0))
  mpan(wn(wceq(c0, emptycls)), wne(cdif(c2, c0), c0), wss(cdif(c2, c0), cdif(c2, c0)))
  ssid(cdif(c2, c0))
  sylan2br(wss(cdif(c2, c0), cdif(c2, c0)), wn(wceq(c0, emptycls)), wne(cdif(c2, c0), c0), wn(wss(c0, cdif(c2, c0))))
  notbii(wss(c0, cdif(c2, c0)), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  ssdifeq0(c0, c2)
  nssne2(cdif(c2, c0), cdif(c2, c0), c0)
  disjprg(s0, cdif(c2, c0), universe, c0, cv(s0), cdif(c2, c0), c0)
  id(wceq(cv(s0), cdif(c2, c0)))
  id(wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c2, emptycls)
  diff.csn.s(s0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c0)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c2, c0)
}

thm disjdifprg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí ‚äî(s0 ‚àà {(c2 \ c0), c0 }, s0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  pm2.61dan((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), ‚äî(s0 ‚àà {(c2 \ c0), c0 }, s0), c0 = ‚àÖ)
  mpbird(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚àß c0 = ‚àÖ), ‚äî(s0 ‚àà {(c2 \ c0), c0 }, s0), ‚äî(s0 ‚àà { c2, ‚àÖ }, s0))
  ad2antlr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c0 = ‚àÖ, ‚äî(s0 ‚àà { c2, ‚àÖ }, s0))
  pm2.61dane(c2, emptycls, c2 ‚àà c3, ‚äî(s0 ‚àà { c2, ‚àÖ }, s0))
  mpbiri((c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c2 = ‚àÖ), ‚äî(s0 ‚àà { c2, ‚àÖ }, s0), ‚äî(s0 ‚àà { ‚àÖ }, s0))

thm disjdifprg2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  syl2anc(wcel(c0, c1), wdisj(s0, cpr(cdif(c0, cin(c0, c2)), cin(c0, c2)), cv(s0)), wcel(cin(c0, c2), universe), wcel(c0, universe))

  diff.cpr.s(s0, cdif(c0, c2), cin(c0, c2))

  diff.cin.s(s0, c0, c2)

blocks.name: disji2f

thm disji2f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wne(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls))
  -| wnfc(s0, c3)

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  3impia(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wne(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls))
  syl5bi(wa(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, c0))), wne(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls), wn(wceq(cv(s0), c2)))
  df-ne(cv(s0), c2)
  ord(wa(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, c0))), wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls))
  impcom(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls)))
  syl5bi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls)), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls)))))
  disjors(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, cv(s0), c0, c2, c0, wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls)))
  orbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls))
  equequ1(hs0, s0, hs1)
  eqeq1d(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls, cin(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  ineq1d(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  syl6eq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c1, csb(s0, cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s0), c1)
  csbid(s0, c1)
  orbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls), wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls))
  eqeq2(cv(hs1), c2, cv(s0))
  eqeq1d(cin(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls, cin(c1, c3), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  ineq2d(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1), c3, wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  csbhypf(hs1, s0, c2, c1, c3)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls)))
  diff.hs1.w(wo(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls)))
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

thm disji2f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚àß(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0)‚àß s0 ‚â† c2)‚Üí(c1 ‚ãÇ c3)= ‚àÖ)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = c2 ‚Üí c1 = c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  3impia(‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), s0 ‚â† c2, (c1 ‚ãÇ c3)= ‚àÖ)
  syl5bi((‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚àß(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0)), s0 ‚â† c2, (c1 ‚ãÇ c3)= ‚àÖ, ¬¨ s0 = c2)
  df-ne(s0, c2)
  ord((‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚àß(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0)), s0 = c2, (c1 ‚ãÇ c3)= ‚àÖ)
  impcom(‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), (s0 = c2 ‚à®(c1 ‚ãÇ c3)= ‚àÖ))
  syl5bi((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), ‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), (s0 = c2 ‚à®(c1 ‚ãÇ c3)= ‚àÖ), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(hs0 = hs1 ‚à®([hs0 / s0]c1 ‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0]c1)= ‚àÖ))))
  disjors(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, s0, c0, c2, c0, (hs0 = hs1 ‚à®([hs0 / s0]c1 ‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0]c1)= ‚àÖ), (s0 = c2 ‚à®(c1 ‚ãÇ c3)= ‚àÖ), (s0 = hs1 ‚à®(c1 ‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0]c1)= ‚àÖ))
  orbi12d(hs0 = s0, hs0 = hs1, ([hs0 / s0]c1 ‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0]c1)= ‚àÖ, s0 = hs1, (c1 ‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0]c1)= ‚àÖ)
  equequ1(hs0, s0, hs1)
  eqeq1d(([hs0 / s0]c1 ‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0]c1), emptycls, (c1 ‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0]c1), hs0 = s0)
  ineq1d([hs0 / s0]c1, [hs1 / s0]c1, c1, hs0 = s0)
  syl6eq([hs0 / s0]c1, c1, [s0 / s0]c1, hs0 = s0)
  csbeq1(s0, hs0, s0, c1)
  csbid(s0, c1)
  orbi12d(hs1 = c2, s0 = hs1, (c1 ‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0]c1)= ‚àÖ, s0 = c2, (c1 ‚ãÇ c3)= ‚àÖ)
  eqeq2(hs1, c2, s0)
  eqeq1d((c1 ‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0]c1), emptycls, (c1 ‚ãÇ c3), hs1 = c2)
  ineq2d(c1, [hs1 / s0]c1, c3, hs1 = c2)
  csbhypf(hs1, s0, c2, c1, c3)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((s0 = hs1 ‚à®(c1 ‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0]c1)= ‚àÖ))
  diff.hs1.w((s0 = c2 ‚à®(c1 ‚ãÇ c3)= ‚àÖ))
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: disjif
blocks.content: Property of a disjoint collection: if ` B ( x ) ` and ` B ( Y ) = D ` have a common element ` Z ` , then ` x = Y ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjif(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c3, c4))), wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  -| wnfc(s0, c4)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(c1, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl3an3(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c3, c4)), wceq(cv(s0), c2), wne(cin(c1, c4), emptycls))
  inelcm(c3, c1, c4)
  3impia(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wne(cin(c1, c4), emptycls), wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  necon1d(cin(c1, c4), emptycls, cv(s0), c2, wa(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, c0))))
  3expia(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wne(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cin(c1, c4), emptycls))
  disji2f(s0, c0, c1, c2, c4)
}

thm disjif(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚àß(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c4))‚Üí s0 = c2)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c4)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {

  necon1d((c1 ‚ãÇ c4), emptycls, s0, c2, (‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚àß(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0)))

  disji2f(s0, c0, c1, c2, c4)
}

blocks.content: Two ways to say that a collection ` B ( i ) ` for ` i e. A ` is disjoint. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Mar-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjorf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  bitr4i(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)))), wal(hs0, wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  df-disj(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  3bitr4i(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)))), wal(hs0, wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wral(s0, c0, wal(hs0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wal(hs0, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  ralcom4(s0, hs0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))

thm disjorf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0 = s1 ‚à®(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ))))

  ‚ä£ (s0 = s1 ‚Üí c1 = c2)

} = {
  bitr4i(‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0 = s1 ‚à®(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ))), ‚àÄ(hs0, ‚àÉ*(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c1)))

  bitri(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0 = s1 ‚à®(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ)), ‚àÄ(hs0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,((hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2)‚Üí s0 = s1))), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs0,((hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2)‚Üí s0 = s1))))

  3bitri((s0 = s1 ‚à®(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ), ‚àÄ(hs0,((hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2)‚Üí s0 = s1)), ((c1 ‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ ‚à® s0 = s1), (¬¨(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ ‚Üí s0 = s1))
  orcom(s0 = s1, (c1 ‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ)
  df-or((c1 ‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ, s0 = s1)
  bitr4i((¬¨(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ ‚Üí s0 = s1), ‚àÄ(hs0,((hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2)‚Üí s0 = s1)), (‚àÉ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))‚Üí s0 = s1))
  imbi1i(¬¨(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ, s0 = s1, ‚àÉ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2)))
  bitri(¬¨(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ, ‚àÉ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2)), ‚àÉ(hs0, hs0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)))
  neq0(hs0, (c1 ‚ãÇ c2))

blocks.name: disjorsf
blocks.content: Two ways to say that a collection ` B ( i ) ` for ` i e. A ` is disjoint. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Mar-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjorsf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(s1), c1), csb(s0, cv(s2), c1)), emptycls)))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  bitri(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wo(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(s1), c1), csb(s0, cv(s2), c1)), emptycls)))), wdisj(s1, c0, csb(s0, cv(s1), c1)))
  cbvdisjf(s0, s1, c0, c1, csb(s0, cv(s1), c1))
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(s1), c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(s1), c1)
  disjor(s1, s2, c0, csb(s0, cv(s1), c1), csb(s0, cv(s2), c1))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(s1), cv(s2), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.csb.s(s1, s0, cv(s2), c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.csb.s(s2, s0, cv(s1), c1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

  impcom(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cin(c1, c4), emptycls)))

  disjorsf(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, cv(s0), c0, c2, c0, wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cin(c1, c4), emptycls)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls)))
  orbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls))

  eqeq2(cv(hs1), c2, cv(s0))
  eqeq1d(cin(c1, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls, cin(c1, c4), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))

blocks.name: disjabrex
blocks.content: Rewriting a disjoint collection into a partition of its image set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Dec-2016.)

blocks.content: Rewriting a disjoint collection into a partition of its image set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Dec-2016.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Mar-2017.)

blocks.name: disjpreima
blocks.content: A preimage of a disjoint set is disjoint. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Feb-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjpreima(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wdisj(s0, c1, c2)), wdisj(s0, c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  imp(wfun(c0), wdisj(s0, c1, c2), wdisj(s0, c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)))
  3imtr4g(wfun(c0), wdisj(s0, c1, c2), wdisj(s0, c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)), emptycls)))), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), csb(s0, cv(hs1), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), emptycls)))))
  ralimdv(hs0, c1, wfun(c0), wral(hs1, c1, wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)), emptycls))), wral(hs1, c1, wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), csb(s0, cv(hs1), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), emptycls))))
  ralimdv(hs1, c1, wfun(c0), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)), emptycls)), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), csb(s0, cv(hs1), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), emptycls)))
  orim2d(wfun(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)), emptycls), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), csb(s0, cv(hs1), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), emptycls))
  syl6ibr(wfun(c0), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)), emptycls), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), csb(s0, cv(hs1), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), emptycls), wceq(cin(cima(ccnv(c0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)), cima(ccnv(c0), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2))), emptycls))
  ex(wfun(c0), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)), emptycls), wceq(cin(cima(ccnv(c0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)), cima(ccnv(c0), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2))), emptycls))
  sylan9req(cin(cima(ccnv(c0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)), cima(ccnv(c0), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2))), emptycls, cima(ccnv(c0), cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2))), wfun(c0), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)), emptycls))
  inpreima(c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2))
  syl6eq(cima(ccnv(c0), cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2))), emptycls, cima(ccnv(c0), emptycls), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)), emptycls))
  imaeq2(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)), emptycls, ccnv(c0))
  ima0(ccnv(c0))
  eqeq1i(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), csb(s0, cv(hs1), cima(ccnv(c0), c2))), emptycls, cin(cima(ccnv(c0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)), cima(ccnv(c0), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2))))
  ineq12i(csb(s0, cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), csb(s0, cv(hs1), cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), cima(ccnv(c0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)), cima(ccnv(c0), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)))
  eqtri(csb(s0, cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), cima(ccnv(c0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)), cima(csb(s0, cv(hs0), ccnv(c0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)))
  csbima12(s0, cv(hs0), ccnv(c0), c2)
  imaeq1i(csb(s0, cv(hs0), ccnv(c0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), ccnv(c0))
  ax-mp(wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), ccnv(c0)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  csbconstg(s0, cv(hs0), universe, ccnv(c0))
  eqtri(csb(s0, cv(hs1), cima(ccnv(c0), c2)), cima(ccnv(c0), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)), cima(csb(s0, cv(hs1), ccnv(c0)), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)))
  csbima12(s0, cv(hs1), ccnv(c0), c2)
  imaeq1i(csb(s0, cv(hs1), ccnv(c0)), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), ccnv(c0))
  ax-mp(wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs1), ccnv(c0)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), universe))
  vex(hs1)
  csbconstg(s0, cv(hs1), universe, ccnv(c0))
  disjors(s0, hs0, hs1, c1, c2)
  disjors(s0, hs0, hs1, c1, cima(ccnv(c0), c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wfun(c0))
  diff.hs1.w(wfun(c0))
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cima(ccnv(c0), c2))
  diff.hs1.c(cima(ccnv(c0), c2))
}

  ‚ä¢ ((Fun(c0)‚àß ‚äî(s0 ‚àà c1, c2))‚Üí ‚äî(s0 ‚àà c1,(`' c0 " c2)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)

} = {
  imp(Fun(c0), ‚äî(s0 ‚àà c1, c2), ‚äî(s0 ‚àà c1,(`' c0 " c2)))
  3imtr4g(Fun(c0), ‚äî(s0 ‚àà c1, c2), ‚äî(s0 ‚àà c1,(`' c0 " c2)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c1,(hs0 = hs1 ‚à®([hs0 / s0]c2 ‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0]c2)= ‚àÖ))), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c1,(hs0 = hs1 ‚à®([hs0 / s0](`' c0 " c2)‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0](`' c0 " c2))= ‚àÖ))))
  ralimdv(hs0, c1, Fun(c0), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c1,(hs0 = hs1 ‚à®([hs0 / s0]c2 ‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0]c2)= ‚àÖ)), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c1,(hs0 = hs1 ‚à®([hs0 / s0](`' c0 " c2)‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0](`' c0 " c2))= ‚àÖ)))
  ralimdv(hs1, c1, Fun(c0), (hs0 = hs1 ‚à®([hs0 / s0]c2 ‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0]c2)= ‚àÖ), (hs0 = hs1 ‚à®([hs0 / s0](`' c0 " c2)‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0](`' c0 " c2))= ‚àÖ))
  orim2d(Fun(c0), hs0 = hs1, ([hs0 / s0]c2 ‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0]c2)= ‚àÖ, ([hs0 / s0](`' c0 " c2)‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0](`' c0 " c2))= ‚àÖ)
  syl6ibr(Fun(c0), ([hs0 / s0]c2 ‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0]c2)= ‚àÖ, ([hs0 / s0](`' c0 " c2)‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0](`' c0 " c2))= ‚àÖ, ((`' c0 "[hs0 / s0]c2)‚ãÇ(`' c0 "[hs1 / s0]c2))= ‚àÖ)
  ex(Fun(c0), ([hs0 / s0]c2 ‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0]c2)= ‚àÖ, ((`' c0 "[hs0 / s0]c2)‚ãÇ(`' c0 "[hs1 / s0]c2))= ‚àÖ)
  sylan9req(((`' c0 "[hs0 / s0]c2)‚ãÇ(`' c0 "[hs1 / s0]c2)), emptycls, (`' c0 "([hs0 / s0]c2 ‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0]c2)), Fun(c0), ([hs0 / s0]c2 ‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0]c2)= ‚àÖ)
  inpreima(c0, [hs0 / s0]c2, [hs1 / s0]c2)
  syl6eq((`' c0 "([hs0 / s0]c2 ‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0]c2)), emptycls, (`' c0 " ‚àÖ), ([hs0 / s0]c2 ‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0]c2)= ‚àÖ)
  imaeq2(([hs0 / s0]c2 ‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0]c2), emptycls, `' c0)
  ima0(`' c0)
  eqeq1i(([hs0 / s0](`' c0 " c2)‚ãÇ[hs1 / s0](`' c0 " c2)), emptycls, ((`' c0 "[hs0 / s0]c2)‚ãÇ(`' c0 "[hs1 / s0]c2)))
  ineq12i([hs0 / s0](`' c0 " c2), [hs1 / s0](`' c0 " c2), (`' c0 "[hs0 / s0]c2), (`' c0 "[hs1 / s0]c2))
  eqtri([hs0 / s0](`' c0 " c2), (`' c0 "[hs0 / s0]c2), ([hs0 / s0]`' c0 "[hs0 / s0]c2))

  ax-mp([hs0 / s0]`' c0 = `' c0, hs0 ‚àà ùïå)

blocks.name: disjrnmpt
blocks.content: Rewriting a disjoint collection using the range of a mapping. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjrnmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wdisj(s1, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cv(s1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  sylibr(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wdisj(s1, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cv(s1)), wdisj(s1, cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), cv(s1)))
  disjabrex(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1)
  ax-mp(wb(wdisj(s1, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cv(s1)), wdisj(s1, cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), cv(s1))), wceq(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))))
  rnmpt(hs0, s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c1)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  disjeq1(s1, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), cv(s1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.crn.s(s1, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cab.s(s1, hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  diff.wrex.s(s1, s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

  ‚ä¢ (‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚Üí ‚äî(s1 ‚àà ran((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)), s1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)

blocks.name: disjin
blocks.content: If a collection is disjoint, so is the collection of the intersections with a given set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 14-Feb-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjin(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wdisj(s0, c0, cin(c1, c2)))
} = {
  3imtr4i(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wdisj(s0, c0, cin(c1, c2)), wal(hs0, wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wal(hs0, wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2)))))
  alimi(hs0, wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2))))
  rmoimi2(s0, c0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2)))
  ax-gen(s0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  anim2i(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  elinel1(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  df-disj(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  df-disj(s0, hs0, c0, cin(c1, c2))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c1, c2))
}

thm disjin(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚Üí ‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)))
} = {
  3imtr4i(‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), ‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)), ‚àÄ(hs0, ‚àÉ*(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c1)), ‚àÄ(hs0, ‚àÉ*(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ c2))))

  rmoimi2(s0, c0, c0, hs0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ c2))

  anim2i(s0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ c2), hs0 ‚àà c1)
  elinel1(hs0, c1, c2)
  df-disj(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  df-disj(s0, hs0, c0, (c1 ‚ãÇ c2))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

blocks.content: If a collection is disjoint, so is the collection of the intersections with a given set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjin2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wdisj(s0, c0, cin(c2, c1)))
} = {
  3imtr4i(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wdisj(s0, c0, cin(c2, c1)), wal(hs0, wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wal(hs0, wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c2, c1)))))
  alimi(hs0, wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wrmo(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c2, c1))))
  rmoimi2(s0, c0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c2, c1)))
  ax-gen(s0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c2, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  anim2i(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  elinel2(cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  df-disj(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  df-disj(s0, hs0, c0, cin(c2, c1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c2, c1))
}

blocks.name: disjxpin
blocks.content: Derive a disjunction over a Cartesian product from the disjunctions over its first and second elements. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Mar-2018.)

blocks.name: iundisjf
blocks.content: Rewrite a countable union as a disjoint union. Cf. ~ iundisj . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 31-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: iundisj2f
blocks.content: A disjoint union is disjoint. Cf. ~ iundisj2 . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Dec-2016.)

  sylan(w0, s1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c0,(c4 ` s0)= s1), (c4 : c0 ‚Üî c2))

blocks.name: disjex
blocks.content: Two ways to say that two classes are disjoint (or equal). (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wceq(c0, c1)), wo(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4ri(wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wceq(c0, c1)), wo(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls)), wo(wceq(c0, c1), wn(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))), wo(wn(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))), wceq(c0, c1)))
  orcom(wceq(c0, c1), wn(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))))
  orbi2i(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls), wn(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))))
  necon2bbii(cin(c0, c1), emptycls, wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
  bitr2i(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wne(cin(c0, c1), emptycls), wne(cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), emptycls))
  neeq1i(cin(c0, c1), emptycls, cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
  df-in(s0, c0, c1)
  abn0(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  imor(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wceq(c0, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm disjex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1))‚Üí c0 = c1)‚Üî(c0 = c1 ‚à®(c0 ‚ãÇ c1)= ‚àÖ))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4ri((‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1))‚Üí c0 = c1), (c0 = c1 ‚à®(c0 ‚ãÇ c1)= ‚àÖ), (c0 = c1 ‚à® ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1))), (¬¨ ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1))‚à® c0 = c1))
  orcom(c0 = c1, ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)))
  orbi2i(c0 = c1, (c0 ‚ãÇ c1)= ‚àÖ, ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)))
  necon2bbii((c0 ‚ãÇ c1), emptycls, ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)))
  bitr2i(‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)), (c0 ‚ãÇ c1)‚â† ‚àÖ, { s0 |(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)} ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  neeq1i((c0 ‚ãÇ c1), emptycls, { s0 |(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)})
  df-in(s0, c0, c1)
  abn0(s0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1))
  imor(‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)), c0 = c1)
}

blocks.name: disjexc
blocks.content: A variant of ~ disjex , applicable for more generic families. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjexc(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wo(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(c0, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  sylibr(wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wo(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls)), wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wceq(c0, c1)))
  imim2i(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(c0, c1))
  3bitr4i(wo(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls)), wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wceq(c0, c1)), wo(wceq(c0, c1), wn(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))), wo(wn(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))), wceq(c0, c1)))
  orcom(wceq(c0, c1), wn(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))))
  orbi2i(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls), wn(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))))
  necon2bbii(cin(c0, c1), emptycls, wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
  bitr2i(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wne(cin(c0, c1), emptycls), wne(cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), emptycls))
  neeq1i(cin(c0, c1), emptycls, cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
  df-in(s0, c0, c1)
  abn0(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  imor(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wceq(c0, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm disjexc(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1))‚Üí s1 = s2)‚Üí(c0 = c1 ‚à®(c0 ‚ãÇ c1)= ‚àÖ))

} = {

  orcom(c0 = c1, ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)))
  orbi2i(c0 = c1, (c0 ‚ãÇ c1)= ‚àÖ, ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)))
  necon2bbii((c0 ‚ãÇ c1), emptycls, ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)))

  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)

  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c0, c2))), wdisj(s0, cun(c2, csn(c0)), c3), wa(wdisj(s0, c2, c3), wceq(cin(ciun(s0, c2, c3), c4), emptycls)), wa(wa(wdisj(s0, c2, c3), wral(hs0, c2, wo(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), csb(s0, c0, c3)), emptycls)))), wral(hs1, c2, wo(wceq(c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, c0, c3), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c3)), emptycls)))))

  bitrd(wcel(c0, c1), wdisj(s0, cun(c2, csn(c0)), c3), wa(wral(hs0, c2, wa(wral(hs1, c2, wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c3)), emptycls))), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), csb(s0, c0, c3)), emptycls)))), wral(hs1, c2, wo(wceq(c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, c0, c3), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c3)), emptycls)))), wa(wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, cun(c2, csn(c0)), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c3)), emptycls)))), wral(hs1, cun(c2, csn(c0)), wo(wceq(c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, c0, c3), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c3)), emptycls)))))

  ineq2d(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c3), csb(s0, c0, c3), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))

blocks.name: disjun0
blocks.content: Adding the empty element preserves disjointness. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjun0(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wdisj(s0, c0, cv(s0)), wdisj(s0, cun(c0, csn(emptycls)), cv(s0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(wdisj(s0, c0, cv(s0)), wdisj(s0, cun(c0, csn(emptycls)), cv(s0)), wcel(emptycls, c0))
  biimparc(wdisj(s0, c0, cv(s0)), wcel(emptycls, c0), wdisj(s0, cun(c0, csn(emptycls)), cv(s0)))
  disjeq1d(s0, cun(c0, csn(emptycls)), cv(s0), c0, wcel(emptycls, c0))
  sylib(wcel(emptycls, c0), wceq(cun(c0, csn(emptycls)), c0), wss(csn(emptycls), c0))
  snssi(emptycls, c0)
  ssequn2(csn(emptycls), c0)
  mpbir2and(wa(wdisj(s0, c0, cv(s0)), wn(wcel(emptycls, c0))), wdisj(s0, cun(c0, csn(emptycls)), cv(s0)), wdisj(s0, c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cin(ciun(s0, c0, cv(s0)), emptycls), emptycls))
  simpl(wdisj(s0, c0, cv(s0)), wn(wcel(emptycls, c0)))
  a1i(wa(wdisj(s0, c0, cv(s0)), wn(wcel(emptycls, c0))), wceq(cin(ciun(s0, c0, cv(s0)), emptycls), emptycls))
  in0(ciun(s0, c0, cv(s0)))
  adantl(wdisj(s0, c0, cv(s0)), wn(wcel(emptycls, c0)), wb(wdisj(s0, cun(c0, csn(emptycls)), cv(s0)), wa(wdisj(s0, c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cin(ciun(s0, c0, cv(s0)), emptycls), emptycls))))
  mpan(wn(wcel(emptycls, c0)), wb(wdisj(s0, cun(c0, csn(emptycls)), cv(s0)), wa(wdisj(s0, c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cin(ciun(s0, c0, cv(s0)), emptycls), emptycls))), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  0ex()
  disjunsn(s0, emptycls, universe, c0, cv(s0), emptycls)
  id(wceq(cv(s0), emptycls))
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, csn(emptycls))
  diff.csn.s(s0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

  simpl(‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, s0), ¬¨ ‚àÖ ‚àà c0)

blocks.name: disjiunel
blocks.content: A set of elements B of a disjoint set A is disjoint with another element of that set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjiunel(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cin(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2), emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wdisj(s0, c3, c1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cdif(c3, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  simprd(w0, wceq(cin(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2), emptycls), wdisj(s0, c0, c1))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wceq(cin(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2), emptycls)), wdisj(s0, cun(c0, csn(c4)), c1))
  sylc(w0, wdisj(s0, cun(c0, csn(c4)), c1), wss(cun(c0, csn(c4)), c3), wdisj(s0, c3, c1))
  unssd(c0, csn(c4), c3, w0)
  snssd(c4, c3, w0)
  disjss1(s0, cun(c0, csn(c4)), c3, c1)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wdisj(s0, cun(c0, csn(c4)), c1), wa(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wceq(cin(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2), emptycls))), wcel(c4, c3), wn(wcel(c4, c0)))
  eldifad(c4, c3, c0, w0)
  eldifbd(c4, c0, c3, w0)
  disjunsn(s0, c4, c3, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, csn(c4))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c4)
}

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ‚äî(s0 ‚àà c3, c1))
  ‚ä£ (s0 = c4 ‚Üí c1 = c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚äÜ c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà(c3 \ c0))

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  simprd(w0, (‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ, ‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1))
  mpbid(w0, (‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚àß(‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ), ‚äî(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ { c4 }), c1))
  sylc(w0, ‚äî(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ { c4 }), c1), (c0 ‚ãÉ { c4 })‚äÜ c3, ‚äî(s0 ‚àà c3, c1))
  unssd(c0, { c4 }, c3, w0)
  snssd(c4, c3, w0)
  disjss1(s0, (c0 ‚ãÉ { c4 }), c3, c1)
  syl2anc(w0, (‚äî(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÉ { c4 }), c1)‚Üî(‚äî(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚àß(‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚ãÇ c2)= ‚àÖ)), c4 ‚àà c3, ¬¨ c4 ‚àà c0)

  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, { c4 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, c4)
}

blocks.name: disjuniel
blocks.content: A set of elements B of a disjoint set A is disjoint with another element of that set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjuniel(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cin(cuni(c0), c1), emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wdisj(s0, c2, cv(s0)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cdif(c2, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl5eq(cin(cuni(c0), c1), emptycls, cin(ciun(s0, c0, cv(s0)), c1), w0)
  ineq1i(cuni(c0), c1, ciun(s0, c0, cv(s0)))
  uniiun(s0, c0)
  disjiunel(s0, c0, cv(s0), c1, c2, c1, w0)
  id(wceq(cv(s0), c1))
}

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ‚äî(s0 ‚àà c2, s0))

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)

  ineq1i(‚ãÉ c0, c1, ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, s0))
  uniiun(s0, c0)
  disjiunel(s0, c0, s0, c1, c2, c1, w0)
  id(s0 = c1)
}
